00016         Address::Address(const std::string& address)
00017         {
00018             std::vector<std::string> addrSplit;
00019             boost::split(addrSplit, address,
00020                          boost::is_any_of(":"),
00021                          boost::token_compress_on);
00022             _host = addrSplit[0];
00023             _port = boost::lexical_cast<unsigned short>(addrSplit[1]);
00024         }

00047         {

00051         std::size_t hash_value(Address const& a)
00052         {
00053             std::size_t seed = 0;
00054             boost::hash_combine(seed, a._host);
00055             boost::hash_combine(seed, a._port);
00056 
00057             return seed;
00058         }

00060         bool operator==(Address const& a1, Address const& a2)
00061         {
00062             return ( a1._host == a2._host ) && ( a1._port == a2._port );
00063         }

00065         bool operator<(Address const& a1, Address const& a2)
00066         {
00067             std::string s1( a1._host + boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(a1._port));
00068             std::string s2( a2._host + boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(a2._port));
00069             return ( s1 < s2 );
00070         }
